lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade had 28 points, Chris Bosh added 18 and the Miami Heat rallied from an eight-point deficit early in the fourth quarter for an 89-84 victory over the Chicago Bulls on Monday night, snapping a four-game losing streak.

headline.print_headline: Wade, Bosh Spark Heat to 89-84 Comeback Win Over Bulls
headline.main: Wade, Bosh Spark Heat to 89-84 Comeback Win Over Bulls

snippet: Dwyane Wade had 28 points, Chris Bosh added 18 and the Miami Heat rallied from an eight-point deficit early in the fourth quarter for an 89-84 victory over the Chicago Bulls on Monday night, snapping a four-game losing streak....
